channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-24528|2024-08-02T10:56:04.225Z -- sap -- fiori%20apps%201.0%20for%20travel%20management%20in%20sap%20erp%20%28my%20travel%20requests%29
item.description: SAP Fiori apps for Travel Management in SAP ERP (My Travel Requests) - version 600, allows an authenticated attacker to exploit a certain misconfigured application endpoint to view sensitive data. This endpoint is normally exposed over the network and successful exploitation can lead to exposure of data like travel documents.

item.title: CVE-2023-23852|2024-08-02T10:42:27.212Z -- sap -- solution%20manager
item.description: SAP Solution Manager (System Monitoring) - version 720, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-0012|2024-08-02T04:54:32.561Z -- sap -- host%20agent%20%28windows%29
item.description: In SAP Host Agent (Windows) - versions 7.21, 7.22, an attacker who gains local membership to SAP_LocalAdmin could be able to replace executables with a malicious file that will be started under a privileged account. Note that by default all user members of SAP_LocaAdmin are denied the ability to logon locally by security policy so that this can only occur if the system has already been compromised.

item.title: CVE-2023-1903|2024-08-02T06:05:27.060Z -- sap -- hcm%20fiori%20app%20my%20forms%20%28fiori%202.0%29
item.description: SAP HCM Fiori App My Forms (Fiori 2.0) - version 605, does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user exposing the restricted header data.

item.title: CVE-2023-0013|2024-08-02T04:54:32.608Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20for%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: The ABAP Keyword Documentation of SAP NetWeaver Application Server - versions 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, for ABAP and ABAP Platform does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. On successful exploitation an attacker can cause limited impact on confidentiality and integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-23855|2024-08-02T10:42:26.959Z -- sap -- solution%20manager
item.description: SAP Solution Manager - version 720, allows an authenticated attacker to redirect users to a malicious site due to insufficient URL validation. A successful attack could lead an attacker to read or modify the information or expose the user to a phishing attack. As a result, it has a low impact to confidentiality, integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-23860|2024-08-02T10:42:27.121Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20for%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: SAP NetWeaver AS for ABAP and ABAP Platform - versions 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, 789, 790, allows an unauthenticated attacker to craft a link, which when clicked by an unsuspecting user can be used to redirect a user to a malicious site which could read or modify some sensitive information or expose the victim to a phishing attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-23857|2024-08-02T10:42:26.822Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20for%20java
item.description: Due to missing authentication check, SAP NetWeaver AS for Java - version 7.50, allows an unauthenticated attacker to attach to an open interface and make use of an open naming and directory API to access services which can be used to perform unauthorized operations affecting users and services across systems. On a successful exploitation, the attacker can read and modify some sensitive information but can also be used to lock up any element or operation of the system making that it unresponsive or unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2023-0025|2024-08-02T04:54:32.567Z -- sap -- solution%20manager%20%28bsp%20application%29
item.description: SAP Solution Manager (BSP Application) - version 720, allows an authenticated attacker to craft a malicious link, which when clicked by an unsuspecting user, can be used to read or modify some sensitive information or craft a payload which may restrict access to the desired resources.

item.title: CVE-2023-0016|2024-08-02T04:54:32.704Z -- sap -- sap%20bpc%20ms%2010.0
item.description: SAP BPC MS 10.0 - version 810, allows an unauthorized attacker to execute crafted database queries. The exploitation of this issue could lead to SQL injection vulnerability and could allow an attacker to access, modify, and/or delete data from the backend database.

item.title: CVE-2023-0015|2024-08-02T04:54:32.587Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: In SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Web Intelligence user interface) - version 420, some calls return json with wrong content type in the header of the response. As a result, a custom application that calls directly the jsp of Web Intelligence DHTML may be vulnerable to XSS attacks. On successful exploitation an attacker can cause limited impact on confidentiality and integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-24530|2024-08-02T10:56:04.364Z -- sap -- businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28cmc%29
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (CMC) - versions 420, 430, allows an authenticated admin user to upload malicious code that can be executed by the application over the network. On successful exploitation, attacker can perform operations that may completely compromise the application causing high impact on confidentiality, integrity and availability of the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-24525|2024-08-02T10:56:04.230Z -- sap -- crm%20%28webclient%20ui%29
item.description: SAP CRM WebClient UI - versions WEBCUIF 748, 800, 801, S4FND 102, 103, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.Â On successful exploitation an authenticated attacker can cause limited impact on confidentiality of the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-24524|2024-08-02T10:56:04.281Z -- sap -- s%2F4%20hana%20%28map%20treasury%20correspondence%20format%20data%29
item.description: SAP S/4 HANA Map Treasury Correspondence Format DataÂ does not perform necessary authorization check for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges. This could allow an attacker to delete the data with a high impact to availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-0024|2024-08-02T04:54:32.588Z -- sap -- solution%20manager%20%28bsp%20application%29
item.description: SAP Solution Manager (BSP Application) - version 720, allows an authenticated attacker to craft a malicious link, which when clicked by an unsuspecting user, can be used to read or modify some sensitive information or craft a payload which may restrict access to the desired resources, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-24521|2024-08-02T10:56:04.371Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20abap%20%28bsp%20framework%29
item.description: Due to insufficient input sanitization, SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP (BSP Framework) - versions 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, allows an unauthenticated user to alter the current session of the user by injecting the malicious code over the network and gain access to the unintended data. This may lead to a limited impact on the confidentiality and the integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-0017|2024-08-02T04:54:32.802Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20for%20java
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker in SAP NetWeaver AS for Java - version 7.50, due to improper access control, can attach to an open interface and make use of an open naming and directory API to access services which can be used to perform unauthorized operations affecting users and data on the current system. This could allow the attacker to have full read access to user data, make modifications to user data, and make services within the system unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2023-24529|2024-08-02T10:56:04.273Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20abap%20%28business%20server%20pages%20application%29
item.description: Due to lack of proper input validation, BSP application (CRM_BSP_FRAME) - versions 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 75C, 75D, 75E, 75F, 75G, 75H, allow malicious inputs from untrusted sources, which can be leveraged by an attacker to execute a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack. As a result, an attacker may be able to hijack a user session, read and modify some sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-0023|2024-08-02T04:54:32.614Z -- sap -- bank%20account%20management%20%28manage%20banks%29
item.description: In SAP Bank Account Management (Manage Banks) application, when a user clicks a smart link to navigate to another app, personal data is shown directly in the URL. They might get captured in log files, bookmarks, and so on disclosing sensitive data of the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-23859|2024-08-02T10:42:27.061Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20for%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: SAP NetWeaver AS for ABAP and ABAP Platform - versions 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, 789, 790, allows an unauthenticated attacker to craft a malicious link, which when clicked by an unsuspecting user, can be used to read or modify some sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-24523|2024-08-02T10:56:04.370Z -- sap -- host%20agent%20service
item.description: An attacker authenticated as a non-admin user with local access to a server port assigned to the SAP Host Agent (Start Service) - versions 7.21, 7.22, can submit a crafted ConfigureOutsideDiscovery request with an operating system command which will be executed with administrator privileges.Â The OS command can read or modify any user or system data and can make the system unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2023-0022|2024-08-02T04:54:32.575Z -- sap -- businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28analysis%20edition%20for%20olap%29
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Analysis edition for OLAP allows an authenticated attacker to inject malicious code that can be executed by the application over the network. On successful exploitation, an attacker can perform operations that may completely compromise the application causing a high impact on the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-24526|2024-08-02T10:56:04.231Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20java%20for%20classload%20service
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java for Classload Service - version 7.50, does not perform any authentication checks for functionalities that require user identity, resulting in escalation of privileges. This failure has a low impact on confidentiality of the data such that an unassigned user can read non-sensitive server data.

item.title: CVE-2023-24527|2024-08-02T10:56:04.429Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20java%20for%20deploy%20service
item.description: SAP NetWeaver AS Java for Deploy Service - version 7.5, does not perform any access control checks for functionalities that require user identity enabling an unauthenticated attacker to attach to an open interface and make use of an open naming and directory API to access a service which will enable them to access but not modify server settings and data with no effect on availability and integrity.

item.title: CVE-2023-23853|2024-08-02T10:42:27.066Z -- sap -- netweaver%20application%20server%20for%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker in AP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP and ABAP Platform - versions 700, 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, 789, 790, can craft a link which when clicked by an unsuspecting user can be used to redirect a user to a malicious site which could read or modify some sensitive information or expose the victim to a phishing attack. Vulnerability has no direct impact on availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-23851|2024-08-02T10:42:26.843Z -- sap -- business%20planning%20and%20consolidation
item.description: SAP Business Planning and Consolidation - versions 200, 300, allows an attacker with business authorization to upload any files (including web pages) without the proper file format validation. If other users visit the uploaded malicious web page, the attacker may perform actions on behalf of the users without their consent impacting the confidentiality and integrity of the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-0018|2024-08-02T04:54:32.580Z -- sap -- businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28central%20management%20console%29
item.description: Due to improper input sanitization of user-controlled input in SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform CMC application - versions 420, and 430, an attacker with basic user-level privileges can modify/upload crystal reports containing a malicious payload. Once these reports are viewable, anyone who opens those reports would be susceptible to stored XSS attacks. As a result of the attack, information maintained in the victim's web browser can be read, modified, and sent to the attacker.

item.title: CVE-2023-23854|2024-08-02T10:42:26.812Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP and ABAP Platform - versions 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-0014|2024-08-02T04:54:32.596Z -- sap -- netweaver%20abap%20server%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: SAP NetWeaver ABAP Server and ABAP Platform - versions SAP_BASIS 700, 701, 702, 710, 711, 730, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, KERNEL 7.22, 7.53, 7.77, 7.81, 7.85, 7.89, KRNL64UC 7.22, 7.22EXT, 7.53, KRNL64NUC 7.22, 7.22EXT, creates information about system identity in an ambiguous format. This could lead to capture-replay vulnerability and may be exploited by malicious users to obtain illegitimate access to the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-24522|2024-08-02T10:56:04.378Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20abap%20%28bsp%20framework%29
item.description: Due to insufficient input sanitization, SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP (Business Server Pages) - versions 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, allows an unauthenticated user to alter the current session of the user by injecting the malicious code over the network and gain access to the unintended data. This may lead to a limited impact on the confidentiality and the integrity of the application.
